WorkItem.Description:
Just started using Chirpy, and its great!

Found one issue with inline minification. 

The following line in my code causes an error
<script type="text/javascript" src="<%= Url.JavaScript("plugins/jquery.rating.js") %>"></script>
The Url.JavaScript is my own Url extension, but you get the idea.  It gives me two errors:
a) syntax error
b) unterminated string literal.
when removing that line everything work fine.
